deprecation.title: The IMAP email content integration is deprecated
deprecation.description:
Please setup an entry for the [imap integration](https://my.home-assistant.io/redirect/config_flow_start?domain=imap) use a `imap` custom event with a template sensor instead and remove the `imap_email_plaform` sensor configuration from your `configuration.yaml`. A sample configuration is shown below (note that only the first of allowed sender is shown):

```yaml
{yaml_example}```
